com.cognifide.slice.core.internal.provider

Class SliceModelProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cognifide.slice.core.internal.provider.SliceModelProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelProvider

    public class SliceModelProvider
extends Object
implements ModelProvider
    This class creates object or list of objects of given injectable type using Guice injector.
    Author:
    Witold Szczerba, Rafa≈Ç Malinowski

      <T> List<T> getChildModels(Class<T> type, org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource parentResource)
      This method lists children of the given resource via parentResource.listChildren(), invokes ModelProvider.get(Class, Resource) for each of them and returns a List containing mapped models.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public final <T> T get(Class<T> type,
        String path)
        Creates new model object of type T from given CRX repository path. During this method call state of ExecutionContextStack is modified - path attribute is added on top of execution stack. It allows for recursive call of ModelProvider methods from model object that is being created. It is possible to use absolute and relative (with "./" prefix) paths in recursive calls. All gets are performed with Context that was used to create this ModelProvider. modelProvider.get(ModelType.class, "/absolute/patch"); modelProvider.get(SubModelType.class, "./relative/path"); This method is thread-safe.
        Specified by:
        get in interface ModelProvider
        Parameters:
        type - class of model object to create
        path - CRX repository path to create object from
        Returns:
        model object from given CRX repository path

      • get

        public <T> T get(Class<T> type,
        org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource)
        Creates new model object of type T from given resource. During this method call state of ExecutionContextStack is modified - resource attribute is added on top of execution stack. It allows for recursive call of ModelProvider methods from model object that is being created. This method is thread-safe.
        Specified by:
        get in interface ModelProvider
        Parameters:
        type - class of model object to create
        resource - Sling resource to create object from
        Returns:
        model object from given resource

It allows for recursive call of ModelProvider methods from model object that is being created. This method is thread-safe.

        public <T> T get(com.google.inject.Key<T> key,
        String path)
        Creates new model object of type T from given CRX repository path. During this method call state of ExecutionContextStack is modified - path attribute is added on top of execution stack. It allows for recursive call of ModelProvider methods from model object that is being created. It is possible to use absolute and relative (with "./" prefix) paths in recursive calls. All gets are performed with Context that was used to create this ModelProvider. This method is thread-safe.
        Specified by:
        get in interface ModelProvider
        Parameters:
        key - a Guice Key which defines binding to a required object
        path - CRX repository path to create object from
        Returns:

        See Also:
        Key

      • get

        public Object get(String className,
         String path)
           throws ClassNotFoundException
        Creates new model object of type specified by given class name. During this method call state of ExecutionContextStack is modified - path attribute is added on top of execution stack. It allows for recursive call of ModelProvider methods from model object that is being created.
        Specified by:
        get in interface ModelProvider
        Parameters:
        className - canonical name of a class to be resolved, e.g. com.cognifide.slice.api.ModelProvider
        path - CRX repository path to create object from
        Returns:
        model object of specified className from given CRX repository path
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - if specified className cannot be resolved by Injector, ClassNotFoundException is thrown

      • get

        public Object get(String className,
         org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource)
           throws ClassNotFoundException
        Creates new model object of type specified by given class name. During this method call state of ExecutionContextStack is modified - path attribute is added on top of execution stack. It allows for recursive call of ModelProvider methods from model object that is being created.
        Specified by:

      • getList

        public final <T> List<T> getList(Class<T> type,
                  Iterator<String> paths)
        Creates list of model objects of type T from given CRX repository paths. During this method call state of ExecutionContextStack is modified for each path from iterator - path is added on top of path stack. It allows for recursive call of ModelProvider methods from model objects that are being created. It is possible to use absolute and relative (with "./" prefix) paths in recursive calls.
        Specified by:
        getList in interface ModelProvider
        Parameters:
        type - class of model objects to create
        paths - iterator that returns CRX repository paths to create objects from
        Returns:
        list of model objects from given CRX repository paths

      • getList

        public final <T> List<T> getList(Class<T> type,
                  String[] paths)
        This is convenience method that works exactly like ModelProvider.getList(Class, Iterator)
        Specified by:
        getList in interface ModelProvider
        Parameters:
        type - class of model objects to create
        paths - array of CRX repository paths to create objects from
        Returns:
        list of model objects from given CRX repository paths

      • getListFromResources

        public <T> List<T> getListFromResources(Class<T> type,
                               Iterator<org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource> resources)
        Description copied from interface: ModelProvider
        Creates list of models of type T from specified resources. Each resource from specified iterator is mapped to a class T
        Specified by:
        getListFromResources in interface ModelProvider
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of model objects to create
        Parameters:
        type - class of model objects to create
        resources - iterator that returns CRX repository resources to create objects from
        Returns:
        list of model objects mapped from given resources. If the resource iterator has no element or is null, then an empty list is returned. It never returns null.

      • getChildModels

        public <T> List<T> getChildModels(Class<T> type,
                         String parentPath)
        This is a convenience method working exactly like ModelProvider.getChildModels(Class, Resource)
        Specified by:
        getChildModels in interface ModelProvider
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of model objects to create
        Parameters:
        type - class of model objects to create
        parentPath - Sling resource path to obtain children (could be relative)
        Returns:
        list of model objects from given CRX repository paths or empty list if parentPath is invalid

      • getChildModels

        public <T> List<T> getChildModels(Class<T> type,
                         org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource parentResource)
        This method lists children of the given resource via parentResource.listChildren(), invokes ModelProvider.get(Class, Resource) for each of them and returns a List containing mapped models. If the parentResource is null, an empty list will be returned.
        Specified by:
        getChildModels in interface ModelProvider
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of model objects to create
        Parameters:
        type - class of model objects to create
        parentResource - Sling resource to obtain children
        Returns:
        list of model objects from given CRX repository paths or empty list if parentResource is null
